tests.prompt: Create a GameContext with a Room. Verify Room(ctx) returns the room.
Create a CharacterRegistry with ability scores. Verify GetCharacterAbilityScores returns scores with correct modifiers (e.g., DEX 16 = +3 modifier).
Place two entities in a Room. Query entities within 5ft of one entity. Verify the other entity is found when within range, not found when outside range.
